dcterms:creator: J. Blitzer
M. Dredze
F. Pereira
dcterms:description: The Amazon review dataset consists of reviews from four domains: books, DVDs, electronics, and kitchen, with each domain containing 2,000 samples (1,000 positive and 1,000 negative). The dataset was pre-processed into a bag of features, losing all word order information, and represented as a 5,000-dimensional vector based on the 5,000 most frequent features.
dcterms:title: Amazon review dataset

dcterms:creator: P. Liu
X. Qiu
X. Huang
dcterms:description: The FDU-MTL dataset consists of 16 domains, including 14 Amazon review domains and two movie review domains (IMDB and MR). The reviews are raw text data that are tokenized using the Stanford tokenizer. The dataset includes a development set of 200 samples and a test set of 400 samples for each domain.
dcterms:title: FDU-MTL dataset
